attributes.action: Cancel Premier League 2019 / 2020 on public health grounds due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: In the interests of public health, to prevent any potential spread of the Covid-19 virus, and avoid an outbreak of intense smugness throughout Merseyside in April, which could rage for years.
attributes.background: Cease the English Premier League football season immediately, determining that there be no winner crowned or teams relegated.  Qualification for next season's European competition to be determined by alphabetical order.
